ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] dragons easier?
ygData.msgSnippet: well first couple times i went on nag raid, naggy was easy.  this last time he handed our arses back to us.  (had about 40+ ppl, usual number) it s been
ygData.messageBody:
well first couple times i went on nag raid, naggy was easy. this last time
he handed our arses back to us. (had about 40+ ppl, usual number)

it's been debated and a large part of our failure may be so few people were
feared this time. with one massive wall of people staying in naggy's breath
radius, everyone dropped at once instead of the recurring waves you get when
a large number are feared.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Greg Gillan [mailto:ggillan@...]
> Sent: Thursday, March 30, 2000 11:39 AM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: [eqbards] dragons easier?
>
>
> I apologize, this is kinda off topic, but a question for some of the high
> level bards.
> Do dragons seem any easier to you guys? We killed Vox last night
> with 30ish
> people. 2 clerics, 1 bard, nobody died. Last time we killed her we also
> had no deaths. Nags was almost as easy.
> My guild is a great bunch of people, but I have trouble believing
> we're that
> good.
>
> Anyone else have an easier than normal time? Possible dragon nerf?
>
>
> Elwyn
>
